channel.title: Comments on: Text Based Adventure Games with Node.js
channel.description: Knowing is different & Doing is different

item.title: By: Fernando
item.dc:creator: Fernando
item.description: Okay, maybe I missed it, but this just shows a game developer how to write a JSON file for the game. Was there any section that helped with say initializing the entire game? Can that be found in the downloaded data?
item.content:encoded: Okay, maybe I missed it, but this just shows a game developer how to write a JSON file for the game. Was there any section that helped with say initializing the entire game? Can that be found in the downloaded data?

item.title: By: Les Orchard
item.dc:creator: Les Orchard
item.description:
You might be interested in Parchment, which runs a lot of text adventures past and present in JS:
https://code.google.com/p/parchment/
Also, check out iplayif.com to see Parchment in action
item.content:encoded:
You might be interested in Parchment, which runs a lot of text adventures past and present in JS:

https://code.google.com/p/parchment/

Also, check out iplayif.com to see Parchment in action

item.title: By: Arvind Ravulavaru
item.dc:creator: Arvind Ravulavaru
item.description: Thanks for sharing Greg. The game sounds interesting! Do you have a script I can use? or would you like to contribute Dusk as a game script to the cli engine?. This will be a great addition to the adventure games stack. -- Thanks.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for sharing Greg. The game sounds interesting! Do you have a script I can use? or would you like to contribute Dusk as a game script to the cli engine?. This will be a great addition to the adventure games stack. — Thanks.

item.title: By: Greg
item.dc:creator: Greg
item.description: Here is a Javascript text adventure murder mystery I made awhile ago: dusk.incompl.com
item.content:encoded: Here is a Javascript text adventure murder mystery I made awhile ago: dusk.incompl.com

item.title: By: Arvind Ravulavaru
item.dc:creator: Arvind Ravulavaru
item.description: Great! Thanks & glad I could be of help.
item.content:encoded: Great! Thanks & glad I could be of help.

item.title: By: SundaraPandyan SA
item.dc:creator: SundaraPandyan SA
item.description: I am obsessed about your blog especially NodeJS stuff... matches perfectly what I was looking for!
item.content:encoded: I am obsessed about your blog especially NodeJS stuff… matches perfectly what I was looking for!
